text-node.description: The GiftRegistry pipeline contains a set of workflows that allow you to create and maintain one or more Gift Registries.
Controls the login, which is required to access gift registry related actions.
Renders a list of gift registries.

start-node.name: Start
start-node.description: Start node used to access main registry page.

decision-node.description: You must specify year if you specify month.

text-node.description: Adds a product to the gift registry. The product must either be a Product object, or is identified by its product ID using the dictionary key ProductID or, if empty, uses the HTTP parameter "pid".

pipelet-node.custom-name: Get the product ID from HttpParameterMap

text-node.description: Provides the actual creation logic for the gift registry in 3 steps: event participants, participant addresses and a final confirmation.
Selects a gift registry from a list of gift registries, e.g. found by the registry search.
Provides actions to edit a gift registry event.
Renders a gift registry details page and provides basic actions such as item updates and publishing.
Ajax Request from PDP to Create a List

start-node.name: ShowStatus
start-node.description: Provides entry point that will show status message.

text-node.description: Searches a gift registry by various parameters.
Looks up a gift registry by its public UUID.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Bind stateCode to sub form group
Bind stateCode to sub form group

text-node.description: Attempts to replace a product in the gift registry.
Provides address related gift registry actions such as address changes.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Bind stateCode to sub form group
Bind stateCode to sub form group

text-node.description: Deletes a gift registry. Only the logged in owner of the gift registry can delete it.

decision-node.description: Only owners of the product list can delete them

pipelet-node.custom-name: Get the product ID from HttpParameterMap

text-node.description: This pipeline is used to add quick order products to a user's list.
